uml2rca.adaptation.association

Class CompositionToAssociationAdaptation

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.adaptation.AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>
        • uml2rca.adaptation.association.CompositionToAssociationAdaptation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>

    public class CompositionToAssociationAdaptation
extends AbstractAdaptation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association,org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association>
    a CompositionToAssociationAdaptation concrete class that is used to adapt a UML composition into an equivalent general association.

    The adaptation consists of adapting the composition into an equivalent target general association whose member ends have no aggregation kind.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractAdaptation, Association, AggregationKind

      • Fields inherited from class core.transformation.AbstractTransformation

        source, target

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompositionToAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      creates a composition to general association adaptation having source as its source composition to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target general association.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void postTransform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Does nothing, as there's nothing to be done after the adaptation
      org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
      Adapts the source composition into a general association by removing the composite aggregation kind of its aggregated member end.

      • CompositionToAssociationAdaptation

        public CompositionToAssociationAdaptation(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
                                   throws NotACompositionException
        creates a composition to general association adaptation having source as its source composition to adapt, then applies the adaptation to obtain the target general association.
        Parameters:
        source - the source composition to adapt.
        Throws:
        NotACompositionException - if the provided source entity is not a composition

        public org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association transform(org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Association source)
        Adapts the source composition into a general association by removing the composite aggregation kind of its aggregated member end.
        Parameters:
